content: I use this space to summarize, review and explain papers, programming and concepts related to quantum physics and quantum computing.

title: All Things Quantum

content:
I am currently using following Resources to enhance my understanding of quantum computing Websites   IBM Q Experience  Books, Articles and News    John Preskills Lecture notes; caltech professor
   Fabric of Reality; David Deutch
   The beginning of infinity; David Deutsch
   Umass blog on quantum computing
   16 Best Resources to Learn Quantum Computing in 2019
   Learning Quantum computing using Qiskit-Text Book
  Audio and Video links    Quantum Information Science Kit: QiSKit, Youtube channel
   Umesh Vazirani, UC Berkely: Quantum Mechanics and Quantum computation
   The introduction to Quantum Computing, Coursera
   Cosmology lectures for U of Oregan class
   Quantum country
   Quantum Mwchanics: Teoretical minimum lectures

title: Some Resources to learn about quantum mechanics and quantum computing
